message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice, but I think a 60/40 split is more equitable given my role in this game.  Let's see if you agree.
Bob, let's be realistic. I'm offering you a larger share than your last proposal. We both lose if this fails.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise. A 55/45 split is a fair compromise, and we can both walk away with a decent amount. Time is running out!
